summary: PHP SDK workflow worker experiences significant memory leaks when workflows are repeatedly restarted via UI, potentially consuming multiple gigabytes of memory and creating zombie processes.
userImpact: Users experience severe memory exhaustion and zombie processes when restarting workflows multiple times, potentially crashing their applications.
workaround: Test with sticky cache size set to less than 10 items to verify if caching is related to the leak.
keyQuote: if you re-run the workflow via the UI too many times, the workflow worker starts leaking memory. You can end up with a zombie process
